sn4.8:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn4.8:4.3: Atha kho māro pāpimā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn4.8:4.4: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato santike imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi:
sn4.8:5.1: * “Nandati puttehi puttimā,
sn4.8:5.4: Na hi so nandati yo nirūpadhī”ti.
sn4.8:6.4: Na hi so socati yo nirūpadhī”ti.
sn4.8:7.1: Atha kho māro pāpimā “jānāti maṃ bhagavā, jānāti maṃ sugato”ti dukkhī dummano tatthevantaradhāyīti.
